answers.answer: Our son was drinking a ton of water for a few days, his breath smelt almost sweet, and he was urinating alot. So I took him to the doctor and we were told that those symtoms were due to high blood sugar. At this point in time his blood sugar level was at 600, after receiving an IV of saline it went down to 300 (which is not great, but better). The next morning we took him to specialist, and he was diagnosed with type 1 diabetes.
Thanks for answering. I got his blood sugar tester out and have been testing him a bit, he is within normal range, but i made him a dr appointment anyway... best to to muck around hey.
